description: You are given an integer array a of size 4 and another integer array b of size at least 4. You need to choose 4 indices i0, i1, i2, and i3 from the array b such that i0 < i1 < i2 < i3. Your score will be equal to the value a[0] * b[i0] + a[1] * b[i1] + a[2] * b[i2] + a[3] * b[i3]. Return the maximum score you can achieve.
